issue.title: [R] Remove system installation devdocs jobs
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13925](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13925). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
With ARROW-13403 we removed testing system setups from the devdocs, we should remove them from the CI as well.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13925?focusedCommentId=17411299) by Jonathan Keane (jonkeane):*
